Guidelines for suggesting images

  • 1st. don't post anything innapropiate. its very weird and disgusting.
  • 2nd. don't post anything suggestive about a user for blankpace. they didnt even do anything
  • 3rd. don't place any links leading to virus downloads or gambling sites. gambling is a huge problem in some countries.
  • 4th. don't use ai. no matter how bad you are, you can use scratch or adobe fresco for art if you want.
  • 5th. you can suggest a video or a sound, but you cant suggest an .exe file,.bat file,vbs file, or .pdf file because they are unrelated.
  • 6th. you can suggest pages, but dont make a html file to show how you want it. we will do it ourselves. but don't worry, you wont get banned.
  • 7th. no predators. we want this site to be safe for anyone but predators.
  • 8th. you can add swear words, but don't add slurs like the nword, etc.
  • 9th. don't clown on anyone. same with the 2nd rule, but without images.
  • 10th. you can leak any features. but don't do this for 100 times. just 1 time then you can do it again in 1 day.
breaking the art related rule gets your image removed/unnapproved. breaking the predator rule will report you to reddit mods.
